Origami Risk solution <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fus-7429.webhooks.gong.io%2Femail-tracking%2Fclicked%3Femail-info-token%3DeyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..enI9NXkVD6e7CZBNjyYYT0lTfH7Z9zCJkpjb5xsJe38%26link%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.origamirisk.co.uk%252Fproducts%252Frisk-management-information-system-rmis&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C8ac29896ad3c42202eaf08dcec589f87%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645112650982047%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gDC8SHm%2Fx9difu0k7tPLBFTvRWFz%2B5ZxdT8KdU4iVew%3D&reserved=0>  helps eliminate manual effort & save time by automating the collecting, managing & reporting of the following data:

*	Incidents and Claims management  - Streamline the incident collection, workflows and end-to-end claims management
*	Certificates of insurance and policy management - Automate renewals & policy management, year-round
*	Values and exposures collection - Break down traditional silos of information to easily collect and track exposures, calculate your organisation’s total cost of risk (TCOR), and automate the allocation process across the enterprise.
